summary: Completed P0/P1 bug testing for Financial Gaming Platform. Backend payment methods API working correctly, frontend requires authentication for full testing. Key P0-1 API verified functional.

registration_issues.impact: Cannot create test accounts for frontend testing

passed_tests: P0-1: Payment methods API returns correct empty array structure
Route protection working correctly (redirects to login)
action_item_for_main_agent: Provide test credentials (username/password) or ensure user registration works properly to enable full P0/P1 frontend testing. Backend payment methods API is working correctly for P0-1 bug verification.
